column5: Hey guys, new to your board heading up to Lake Nippising in a few weeks. Anyone know how the bite is for pike and walleye. And any tips or help would be great. Staying at a cabin in Callander Bay. Learn a lot from you all, in the past few weeks just reading.....

The walleye bite is pritty good at the moment. They're slowly moving into their summer spots.  You say your comming down in a couple weeks, and by that time they will definitely be lurking around the reefs in deeper water.
